name: Cheese Ring
author: WILDLIND
summary: This zesty cheese ring can be also made as a log. The jelly may seem strange, but it is what makes this appetizer delicious.
ingredients: 5 medium green onions, finely chopped (white parts only)
1 pinch garlic salt, or to taste
directions: In a medium bowl, mix together the Cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, green onion, cayenne pepper, and garlic salt until well blended
Coat a ring shaped gelatin mold generously with cooking spray
Spoon the cheese mixture into the mold, cover, and chill for 2 to 3 hours to set
Unmold onto a serving plate, and pour raspberry preserves into the center
Arrange wheat crackers around the outside of the ring
